name: Web WeChat
description: Web WeChat allows you to use WeChat in a more convenient and intuitionistic way. By Web WeChat, you can synchronize files, input message with keyboard, share videos, download image files to PC and so on.

en_US.description: Web WeChat allows you to use WeChat in a more convenient and intuitionistic way. By Web WeChat, you can synchronize files, input message with keyboard, share videos, download image files to PC and so on.
en_US.name: Web WeChat

zh_CN.description: 微信网页版，使您可以以更加方便直观的方式来使用微信。借助网页版微信，您可以同步文件、使用键盘来写信息、共享视频以及下载图片文件到电脑端等。
zh_CN.name: 微信网页版
